title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
text:
Home › Pro Sports › Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K Advertising Widget Posted: October 24, 2015 1:49 a.m. Updated: October 24, 2015 1:49 a.m. 
NEW YORK (AP) — When it came time for a pro coach again, the U.S. basketball team turned to the one considered the NBA’s best. ** Subscribers Log in to read this full article.
